price: 112.Ee hay kuna sugnow dhabbaha toosan (ee Islaamka) sida lagu amrayba, (adiga) iyo kuwa la jirkaa u soo laabtay (xagga Alle ee toobad keenay), hana xadgudbina. Hubaal, Alle wuu arkaa Waxaad camal fashaan.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَقِمۡ كَمَآ أُمِرۡتَ وَمَن تَابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَطۡغَوۡاْۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'taqim kamā umir'ta waman tāba maʿaka walā taṭghaw innahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
